name: danceflow
description: The ultimate Neovim alternative for VSCode. Custom modes, key bindings, and a clean interface—forked from Danceflow, inspired by Helix.

scripts.test: yarn run compile --sourcemap && yarn run compile-tests && node ./out/test/run.js
scripts.vscode:prepublish: yarn run generate && yarn run compile && yarn run compile-web

untrustedWorkspaces.description: Existing menu items and mode commands can only be updated if the current workspace is trusted in order to ensure untrusted workspaces do not execute malicious commands.

danceflow.defaultMode.description: Controls which mode is set by default when an editor is opened.

inheritFrom.description: Controls how default configuration options are obtained for this mode. Specify a string to inherit from the mode with the given name, and null to inherit from the VS Code configuration.

lineHighlight.markdownDescription: Controls the line highlighting applied to active lines. Can be an hex color, a [theme color](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/theme-color) or null.
lineHighlight.patternErrorMessage: Color should be an hex color or a '$' sign followed by a color identifier.

lineNumbers.description: Controls the display of line numbers.

onEnterMode.description: Controls what commands should be executed upon entering this mode.

onLeaveMode.description: Controls what commands should be executed upon leaving this mode.

selectionBehavior.description: Controls how selections behave within VS Code.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Selections are anchored to carets, which is the native VS Code behavior; that is, they are positioned *between* characters and can therefore be empty.

Selections are anchored to characters, like Kakoune; that is, they are positioned *on* characters, and therefore cannot be empty. Additionally, one-character selections will behave as if they were non-directional, like Kakoune.

applyTo.description: The selections to apply this style to.
enumDescriptions: Apply to all selections except main selection.

backgroundColor.patternErrorMessage: Color should be an hex color or a '$' sign followed by a color identifier.

borderColor.patternErrorMessage: Color should be an hex color or a '$' sign followed by a color identifier.

decorations.description: The decorations to apply to selections.

applyTo.description: The selections to apply this style to.
enumDescriptions: Apply to all selections except main selection.

backgroundColor.patternErrorMessage: Color should be an hex color or a '$' sign followed by a color identifier.

borderColor.patternErrorMessage: Color should be an hex color or a '$' sign followed by a color identifier.

applyTo.description: The selections to apply this style to.
enumDescriptions: Apply to all selections except main selection.

backgroundColor.patternErrorMessage: Color should be an hex color or a '$' sign followed by a color identifier.

borderColor.patternErrorMessage: Color should be an hex color or a '$' sign followed by a color identifier.

hiddenSelectionsIndicatorsDecoration.description: The decorations to apply to the hidden selections indicator, shown when some selections are below or above the lines currently shown in the editor. Specify an empty object {} to disable this indicator.

danceflow.modes.description: Controls the different modes available in Danceflow.

danceflow.menus.description: Controls the different menus available in Danceflow.

command.description: Command to execute on item selection.

args.description: Arguments to the command to execute.

g.text: to line number else file start

danceflow.systemClipboardRegister.description: Controls which register maps to the system clipboard.

danceflow.enabled.description: Controls whether the Danceflow keybindings are enabled.
danceflow.enabled.deprecationMessage: danceflow.enabled is deprecated; disable the Danceflow extension instead.

danceflow.moveMode.lineHighlight.markdownDescription: Controls the line highlighting applied to active lines in move mode. Can be an hex color, a [theme color](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/theme-color) or null.
danceflow.moveMode.lineHighlight.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#danceflow.modes#` instead.

danceflow.modifyMode.lineHighlight.markdownDescription: Controls the line highlighting applied to active lines in modify mode. Can be an hex color, a [theme color](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/theme-color) or null.
danceflow.modifyMode.lineHighlight.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#danceflow.modes#` instead.

danceflow.moveMode.lineNumbers.description: Controls the display of line numbers in move mode.
danceflow.moveMode.lineNumbers.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#danceflow.modes#` instead.

danceflow.modifyMode.lineNumbers.description: Controls the display of line numbers in modify mode.
danceflow.modifyMode.lineNumbers.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#danceflow.modes#` instead.

danceflow.moveMode.cursorStyle.description: Controls the cursor style in move mode.
danceflow.moveMode.cursorStyle.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#danceflow.modes#` instead.

danceflow.modifyMode.cursorStyle.description: Controls the cursor style in modify mode.
danceflow.modifyMode.cursorStyle.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#danceflow.modes#` instead.

danceflow.modifyMode.selectionStyle.description: The style to apply to selections in modify mode.
danceflow.modifyMode.selectionStyle.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#danceflow.modes#` instead.

danceflow.selectionBehavior.description: Controls how selections behave within VS Code.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Selections are anchored to carets, which is the native VS Code behavior; that is, they are positioned *between* characters and can therefore be empty.

Selections are anchored to characters, like Kakoune; that is, they are positioned *on* characters, and therefore cannot be empty. Additionally, one-character selections will behave as if they were non-directional, like Kakoune.
danceflow.selectionBehavior.markdownDeprecationMessage: Built-in modes are deprecated. Use `#danceflow.modes#` instead.
